data.title: Quiz & Dragons: Capcom Quiz Game
data.meta_description: Quiz & Dragons: Capcom Quiz Game  is a quiz game released in arcades by Capcom in 1992. The game combines some stylistic elements of role-playing video games such as a fantasy theme and multiple characters with that of board games to create a unique twist to the quiz game genre.
